attributes.action: We the undersigned petition the Prime Minister to take into account that our troops are fighting and dying in Iraq and Afghanistan and it is costing their families and friends too much to send them food parcels, so we ask him to secure free postage for these items on their behalf  thank you Maria Dodsworth
attributes.action_prefix: We the undersigned petition the Prime Minister to
attributes.background:
There are men and wemen risking their lives daily for this country in Iraq and Afghanistan. The greatest morale booster that these brave men can receive is regular and speedy contact with their families.
Equally, the greatest comfort that the families left in this country can receive is regular personal contact with their husbands, wives, sons or daughters, and girlfriends serving in Iraq and Afghanistan.
Full free postage and communication for these families is a price our grateful nation should be prepared to pay.

reasons: Duplicate - this is similar to and/or overlaps with an existing petition or petitions
